metadata.Title: CVE-2023-37453 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the USB subsystem in the Linux kernel through6.4.2. There is an out-of-bounds and crash in read_descriptors indrivers/usb/core/sysfs.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
